content.rendered:
Nigeria’s creative scene remains abuzz with exciting inflows of fashion, art, and music. As other forms of art enjoy constant focus and representation, the Lagos Photo Festival presents photography with a platform from which to stand amongst the other mediums. The festival plays host to a variety of workshops, panel discussions, artist talks and portfolio reviews which seek to bolster photography in around Africa. Now in its 9th edition, the event is Nigeria’s first and only international arts festival of photography. It presents photography as it is embodied in the exploration of historical and contemporary issues, the promotion of social programmes, and the reclamation and engagement of public spaces in showcasing the contemporary styles of the art.

More on The Luxe Digest

jetpack-related-posts.title: Bella Disu, Chevalier Dans L’ordre Des Arts Et Des Lettres
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: France has honoured the Executive Vice Chairman of Globacom, Mrs Bella Disu with the prestigious national honour of “Chevalier dans l’ordre des Arts et des Lettres”. The Award, which is in recognition of Mrs Disu's remarkable support for arts and culture, especially her coordination of the construction of the iconic Alliance…
